row.ingredients: batata; azúcar; canela; harina; leche; mantequilla; huevo; sal
row.ingredients_en: sweet potato; sugar; cinnamon; flour; milk; butter; egg; salt
row.ingredient_list_en: 1 pound sweet potato boiled and mashed; 1-2 cup sugar; 1-4 teaspoon cinnamon; 1-4 cup wheat flour; 1-4 cup milk; 2 tablespoons butter melted; 2 beaten eggs; 1-4 teaspoon salt
row.directions: Mezcle los ingredientes en el orden que aparecen, bata para unirlos bien.; Vierta en un molde éngrasado y cueza en horno de calor moderado de 20 a 30 minutos.
row.directions_en: Mix the ingredients in the order they appear, beat to join them well.; Pour into an engrated mold and cook in a moderate heat oven for 20 to 30 minutes.
row.title: budin de batata
